text:
Bespoke Post | New York, NY | FULL-TIME | ONSITE

We're a men's ecommerce and lifestyle company. Current engineering team is 4 developers

Tech stack:

* Angular in the browser

* Ruby on Rails on the server

* PostgreSQL DB

Open Positions:

* Full-Stack Developer (Mid - Sr level)

To apply: https://www.bespokepost.com/careers?b
